abstract: European Union continues assisting Greek authorities in construction of first of several planned processing centers intended to receive asylum seekers who continue to overwhelm country's islands; officials express hope first such structure, under construction on island of Lesbos, will be completed by mid-December.
lead_paragraph: Efforts to create centers to better process migrants heading to Europe have come into the spotlight after the terrorist attacks in Paris this month.

headline.main: Regulating Flow of Refugees Gains Urgency in Greece and Rest of Europe
headline.print_headline: In Greece, Need to Manage Migrant Tide Gains Urgency

snippet: Efforts to create centers to better process migrants heading to Europe have come into the spotlight after the terrorist attacks in Paris this month.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
